document_data.name: Shatterhull
document_data.mainbody: '''''Shatterhull''''' was a [[spell]] unique to [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.
document_data.Effects:
This spell considerably weakened any structure submerged in water. It was commonly used on ships at sea. This spell could create a gaping hole in the side of a ship or just several leaks depending on the inherent strength of the wood.

[[Spelljammer]]s were generally safe from the effects of this spell, as they traveled through the [[phlogiston]] rather than water.
document_data.Components: This spell required a thin glass needle to cast.
